1370: Vreile was born in Waale straet in 1370.
Got married to Alebrando at age 18 in 1370.
Gave birth to Ricward in 1370 at age 18.
1371: Lost son Ricward when Ricward was 2 years old.
1372: Gave birth to Woltwigis in 1372 at age 20.
1373: Gave birth to Reynold in 1373 at age 21.
1374: Gave birth to Reinardus in 1374 at age 22.
1376: Gave birth to Hilduardis in 1376 at age 24.
Lost daughter Hilduardis when Hilduardis was 1 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Soeten in 1378 at age 26.
1379: Gave birth to Mabelie in 1379 at age 27.
1380: Gave birth to Berta in 1380 at age 28.
1382: Lost daughter Mabelie when Mabelie was 4 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1387: Lost daughter Berta when Berta was 8 years old.
